story_23_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We made it through the second round of the finals.
Things are going pretty well for us!
story_23_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Indeed. It’s been nonstop exciting battles the
whole way.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’ve hardly even had time to sleep.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hold on! Don’t go falling asleep during battle now!
story_23_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hee hee. Our opponents for the third round should
be revealed soon.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh? Why the long faces, you two?
Has something happened?
story_23_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Well, we met some kid Trainers on the way here.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Ah! I get it! You lost to them in a battle!
story_23_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
No, that’s not it at all! It’s what they said.
They said our Pokémon were cool, but...
story_23_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
This garb has been passed down from ninja to
ninja for generations. To hear such disrespect for
it is...
story_23_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
My look is so trendy, it’s on everyone’s lips in
Johto! Pasio just hasn’t reached my level yet!
story_23_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: I admit I wasn’t expecting that...
story_23_01000/2401_0301_1900_10: I think you two look great.
story_23_01000/2401_0401_2000_10:
R-right! I’d expect nothing less from your
sensibilities, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_23_01000/2401_0402_2300_10:
Hee hee. I suppose you could say the two of you
have quite the bold sense of style.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: Oh! Is that you over there, Erika?
story_23_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: I’m glad we ran into each other.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: Is this a friend of yours, Erika?
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Yes. This is Valerie, a Gym Leader from Kalos.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
She’s also a designer who makes all manner of
wonderful clothing.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: I’m Valerie. A pleasure to meet you.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: Hm? The way you speak... Are you from Johto?
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3400_10:
That’s right. In Kalos, I’m known as the maiden
from a land with history.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3700_10: What business do you have with us?
story_23_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
They pair so well with your partner Pokémon.
I think they’re wonderful.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4300_10:
That’s right, Valerie!
My style is incredible, don’t you think?
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Fwahahaha! I’d expect nothing less from
a designer!
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4500_10: Well, you two sure look pleased...
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Valerie, since you’re here, would you mind
joining me on a walk? I have something I’d like
to speak with you about.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Really? That’d be wonderful. I’m still not quite
used to things here on Pasio. I hardly know my
left from my right.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4800_10:
Hee hee. Then I’d be glad to show you
around town.
story_23_01000/2401_1001_4900_10: I suppose we’ll be off, then.
